review: I'm really impressed with this streaming tool.  The setup was easy, and the menu navigation is very intuitive. I easily linked my Amazon prime, pandora, YouTube, and Netflix accounts.  However, the preloaded HBO Go app is not the same as the HBO Now app, so I was unable to use my HBO Now streaming service, which is a major disappointment.  I would recommend this gadget for anyone looking to link their TV with streaming app services.
author: Stephen Sapienza

review: Works easily. Comcast/Xfinity doesn't allow some features because they are EVIL!
author: Yvonne Leach

review: Tested it on regular TV- removed the older FireStick and replaced it with the new one. It works great. Will put the other FireStike in another room. Really love it.
